semantics.label: ترجمة مظهر المستخدم لاسئلة صح ام خطاء

fields.label: نص الاراء
fields.description: Feedback text, variables available: @score and @total. Example: 'You got @score of @total possible points'

fields.label: عرض كتابي للنتيجه لمستخدمي القارئ المتكلم
Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

semantics.label: إعدادت النشاط
semantics.description: وهذه الخيارات تمكنك من التحكم في كيفية سلوك هذا النشاط

fields.label: Automatically check answer
fields.description: Note that accessibility will suffer if enabling this option

fields.label: Feedback on correct answer
fields.description: This will override the default feedback text. Variables available: @score and @total

fields.label: Feedback on wrong answer
fields.description: This will override the default feedback text. Variables available: @score and @total

fields.label: النص الأساسي
fields.default: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

fields.label: النص الأساسي
fields.default: Are you sure you wish to retry ?
